price: 也归于应答主的号召，且谨守拜功者；他们的事务，是由协商而决定的，他们分舍我所赐予他们的；
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱسۡتَجَابُواْ لِرَبِّهِمۡ وَأَقَامُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَأَمۡرُهُمۡ شُورَىٰ بَيۡنَهُمۡ وَمِمَّا رَزَقۡنَٰهُمۡ يُنفِقُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna is'tajābū lirabbihim wa-aqāmū al-ṣalata wa-amruhum shūrā baynahum wamimmā razaqnāhum yunfiqūna
